page.title: 08FARMING IN PENISTONE.
page.content: There is a lot of{farming}around Penistone.Out of the 5 farms we visited there was an average of 39 {dairy}cattle,13{beef}cattle,0 pigs,8 sheep,0 hens and 1 dog.Most land was permanent pasture or sown grass,also most farms made hay or silage.Most of the farms were dependent upon their products. Penistone was the most important to them rather than Barnsley because of the cattle market and shops. There was an average of 4 tractors at each farm. Most of the young people went to the Young Farmers Club in the area. Other{crops}grown where cereals,roots and kale.
